explanations.only: The only possible solution is {{ explanation.cell.value }}
explanations.random: The definite solution for this cell couldn't be determined. Possible solutions would be [{{ explanation.possibleSolutions }}]. Picked random solution {{ explanation.cell.value }}.
explanations.solved: Possible solutions for this cell could have been [{{ explanation.notesBefore }}]. The only numbers that can go into this cell are [{{ explanation.possibleSolutions }}]. Therefore the solution is {{ explanation.cell.value }}.
